text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hello I'm Trevor a cloud support
engineer here at the AWS office in Cape
Town South Africa today I'm going to
show you how you can activate DNA SEC on
your domain with Amazon Route 53 and
register a DNS record let's get started
after logging into the AWS Management
console navigate to the rav53 console
on the left pane select hostage zones
on the right pane you can see a list of
your hostage zones select the domain
name of the water Zone that you want to
activate DNA SEC on
choose dna6 signing on the three tabs
under hostage Zone details select the
enable dnsic signing button
in the enable genetics signing window
enter the name of your key signing key
or ksk
in the customer managed cmk in AWS KMS
section select create customer manage
cmk
enter an Alia's name for your AWS Key
Management Service customer managed key
select the create ksk and enable signing
button to activate dnseg signing on your
public hostage Zone
activating dnsek on a public hostage
Zone takes a few minutes
now that dnsic is activated on the
hostage Zone you'll need to establish a
chain of trust for the hostage Zone to
complete your DNA SEC signing setup
in the hostage zones DNS 6 signing tab
select the view information to create DS
record button
select establish a chain of trust from
the drop down list
if your domain is registered with the
Amazon Route 53 registrar not the
information that is under the Route 53
registrar drop down list if your domain
is registered with another registrar not
the information that is under another
domain registrar drop down list
this domain is registered with Amazon
rough 53 registrar so not key type
signing algorithm and public key values
copy the public key value
in the left pane select registered
domains
select the domain where you just copied
the public key
in the dna6 status section select manage
keys
in the pop-up window enter the values
for key type signing algorithm and
public key
select the add button and then close
activating dnsic on a public hosted Zone
takes a few minutes
finally go to the very sign Genesect
analyzer to verify Genesect
functionality
so now you know how you can activate DNA
SEC on your domain with Route 53 and
register a DS record thanks for watching
and happy cloud computing from all of us
here at AWS
[Music]
